verses.verse: And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> evil<WH7451> again<WH3254> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD;<WH3068> and the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines<WH6430> forty<WH705> years.<WH8141>

And there was a certain<WH259> man<WH376> of Zorah,<WH6881> of the family<WH4940> of the Danites,<WH1839> whose name<WH8034> was Manoah;<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> was barren,<WH6135> and bore<WH3205> not.

And the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> appeared<WH7200> to the woman,<WH802> and said<WH559> to her, Behold<WH2009> now,<WH4994> you are barren,<WH6135> and bore<WH3205> not: but you shall conceive,<WH2029> and bear<WH3205> a son.<WH1121>
Now<WH6258> therefore beware,<WH8104> I pray<WH4994> you, and drink<WH8354> not wine<WH3196> nor strong drink,<WH7941> and eat<WH398> not any<WH3605> unclean<WH2931> thing:

For, see,<WH2009> you shall conceive,<WH2030> and bear<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and no<WH3808> razor<WH4177> shall come<WH5927> on<WH5921> his head:<WH7218> for the child<WH5288> shall be a Nazarite<WH5139> to God<WH430> from the womb:<WH990> and he shall begin<WH2490> to deliver<WH3467> Israel<WH3478> out of the hand<WH3027> of the Philistines.<WH6430>

Then the woman<WH802> came<WH935> and told<WH559> her husband,<WH376> saying,<WH559> A man<WH376> of God<WH430> came<WH935> to me, and his countenance<WH4758> was like the countenance<WH4758> of an angel<WH4397> of God,<WH430> very<WH3966> terrible:<WH3372> but I asked<WH7592> him not from where<WH335> <WH2088> he was, neither<WH3808> told<WH5046> he me his name:<WH8034>

But he said<WH559> to me, Behold,<WH2009> you shall conceive,<WH2030> and bear<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and now<WH6258> drink<WH7941> no<WH408> wine<WH3196> nor strong drink,<WH8354> neither<WH408> eat<WH398> any<WH3605> unclean<WH2932> thing: for the child<WH5288> shall be a Nazarite<WH5139> to God<WH430> from the womb<WH990> to the day<WH3117> of his death.<WH4194>

Then Manoah<WH4495> entreated<WH6279> the LORD,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> O my Lord,<WH3068> let the man<WH376> of God<WH430> which<WH834> you did send<WH7971> come<WH935> again<WH5750> to us, and teach<WH3384> us what<WH4100> we shall do<WH6213> to the child<WH5288> that shall be born.<WH3205>

And God<WH430> listened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Manoah;<WH4495> and the angel<WH4397> of God<WH430> came<WH935> again<WH5750> to the woman<WH802> as she sat<WH3427> in the field:<WH7704> but Manoah<WH4495> her husband<WH376> was not with her.

And the woman<WH802> made haste,<WH4116> and ran,<WH7323> and showed<WH5046> her husband,<WH376> and said<WH559> to him, Behold,<WH2009> the man<WH376> has appeared<WH7200> to me, that came<WH935> to me the other day.<WH3117>

And Manoah<WH4495> arose,<WH6965> and went<WH3212> after<WH310> his wife,<WH802> and came<WH935> to the man,<WH376> and said<WH559> to him, Are you the man<WH376> that spoke<WH1696> to the woman?<WH802> And he said,<WH559> I am.
And Manoah<WH4495> said,<WH559> Now<WH6258> let your words<WH1697> come<WH935> to pass.<WH935> How<WH4100> shall we order<WH4941> the child,<WH5288> and how shall we do<WH6213> to him?
And the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Manoah,<WH4495> Of all<WH3605> that I said<WH559> to the woman<WH802> let her beware.<WH8104>

She may not eat<WH398> of any<WH3605> thing that comes<WH3318> of the vine,<WH1612> neither<WH408> let her drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> or strong drink,<WH7941> nor<WH408> eat<WH398> any<WH3605> unclean<WH2932> thing: all<WH3605> that I commanded<WH6680> her let her observe.<WH8104>
And Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> of the LORD,<WH3068> I pray<WH4994> you, let us detain<WH6113> you, until<WH5704> we shall have made<WH6213> ready a kid<WH1423> <WH5795> for you.

And the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to Manoah,<WH4495> Though<WH518> you detain<WH6113> me, I will not eat<WH398> of your bread:<WH3899> and if<WH518> you will offer<WH6213> a burnt<WH5930> offering, you must offer<WH5927> it to the LORD.<WH3068> For Manoah<WH4495> knew<WH3045> not that he was an angel<WH4397> of the LORD.<WH3068>

And Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> of the LORD,<WH3068> What<WH4310> is your name,<WH8034> that when<WH3588> your sayings<WH1697> come<WH935> to pass<WH935> we may do you honor?<WH3513>
And the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> to him, Why<WH4100> ask<WH7592> you thus<WH2088> after my name,<WH8034> seeing it is secret?<WH6383>

So Manoah<WH4495> took<WH3947> a kid<WH1423> <WH5795> with a meat offering,<WH4503> and offered<WH5927> it on a rock<WH6697> to the LORD:<WH3068> and the angel did<WH6213> wondrously;<WH6381> and Manoah<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> looked<WH7200> on.

For it came<WH1961> to pass, when the flame<WH3851> went<WH5927> up toward heaven<WH8064> from off<WH5921> the altar,<WH4196> that the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> ascended<WH5927> in the flame<WH3851> of the altar.<WH4196> And Manoah<WH4495> and his wife<WH802> looked<WH7200> on it, and fell<WH5307> on<WH5921> their faces<WH6440> to the ground.<WH776>

But the angel<WH4397> of the LORD<WH3068> did no<WH3808> more<WH3254> appear<WH7200> to Manoah<WH4495> and to his wife.<WH802> Then<WH227> Manoah<WH4495> knew<WH3045> that he was an angel<WH4397> of the LORD.<WH3068>
And Manoah<WH4495> said<WH559> to his wife,<WH802> We shall surely die,<WH4191> because<WH3588> we have seen<WH7200> God.<WH430>

But his wife<WH802> said<WH559> to him, If<WH3863> the LORD<WH3068> were pleased<WH2654> to kill<WH4191> us, he would not have received<WH3947> a burnt<WH5930> offering<WH4503> and a meat offering at our hands,<WH3027> neither<WH3808> would he have showed<WH7200> us all<WH3605> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> nor<WH3808> would as at this time<WH6256> have told<WH8085> us such things<WH1697> as these.<WH2063>
And the woman<WH802> bore<WH3205> a son,<WH1121> and called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Samson:<WH8123> and the child<WH5288> grew,<WH1431> and the LORD<WH3068> blessed<WH1288> him.
And the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> began<WH2490> to move<WH6470> him at times in the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> between<WH996> Zorah<WH6881> and Eshtaol.<WH847>
